meanings.definition: The act of traveling in outer space.
meanings.sent1: Many people dream of going on spaceflights one day.
meanings.sent2: NASA plans to launch more spaceflights to explore Mars.
meanings.sent3: The aliens found our spaceflights quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her imagination took her on spaceflights to distant galaxies.
meanings.sent5: The spaceflights were filled with wonder and excitement.

meanings.definition: A journey or voyage through space.
meanings.sent1: The spaceflights to the moon were historic achievements.
meanings.sent2: Space enthusiasts enjoy watching documentaries about spaceflights.
meanings.sent3: The spaceflights encountered a traffic jam near Jupiter.
meanings.sent4: Their love was a spaceflight through the stars, never-ending and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The spaceflights across the universe revealed endless mysteries.

meanings.sent1: Training for spaceflights requires dedication and skill.
meanings.sent2: The astronauts prepared meticulously for their upcoming spaceflights.
meanings.sent3: The spaceflights were delayed due to a cosmic bird nesting on the rocket.
meanings.sent4: His career in spaceflights soared to new heights.
meanings.sent5: The spaceflights showcased human ingenuity and exploration.
